Summary: he Light was slowly heading SE, Stopped for a few seconds in front of me, over my window then turned off its light(s).
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the kitchen getting a glass of water looking out the small window upstairs over my sink at 10 to 11PM. An extra bright, larger than a star light caught my attention about 2-3 miles away to the left ore or less over Tarpon Springs, FL. It seemed to be headed in my direction. I thought it might be a helicopter but it was traveling very slow and made no noise. As it got closer it seemed to be headed over my 2 story house toward the window where I was standing. It seemed to be very close when the light stopped moving for a few seconds, as I gazed at this event the light went out or vanished. The Light was slowly heading SE, Stopped for a few seconds in front of me, over my window then turned off its light(s).
